files.description: Provides a single output-path resolver that returns an output root using an environment variable override or defaults to a relative outputs directory and ensures required directories exist.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/utils/paths.py
DIR_STATE:["src/utils/output_path.py", "src/utils/output_paths.py", "src/utils/outputs_dir.py", "src/utils/paths.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a centralized output-root/path resolver with env-var override, defaulting to ./outputs and ensuring required directories exist.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/utils/paths.py
DIR_STATE:["src/utils/output_path.py", "src/utils/output_paths.py", "src/utils/outputs_dir.py", "src/utils/paths.py", "src/utils/repro.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a centralized output-path resolver with env-var override and directory-creation helpers.

files.description: Defines a CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs the pipeline script to verify expected output artifacts are created in the default outputs directory.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/pipeline-ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a GitHub Actions CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs the pipeline, and asserts expected artifacts are created in ./outputs.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/pipeline-ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs the pipeline, and verifies the expected output artifacts exist under ./outputs.

missionDescription: Implement a single output-path utility (e.g., src/utils/paths.py) that resolves an output root as (ENV VAR if set else ./outputs), update all writers to use it, then run `python scripts/run_pipeline.py` and confirm it creates ./outputs/run_stamp.json, run.log, results.json, figure.png, and index.md.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly supports the strategic directive that the pipeline deterministically writes artifacts to repo-relative ./outputs/ (avoids permission failures from absolute /outputs). Also creates a reusable,...
